mapper.select:
select `id` , `creditorderno`, `name` , `startdate` , `regaddress` , `officeaddress`, `orgsize` , `license` , `taxregno` , `orgcode` , `regaccount` , `regdate` , `empsize` , `legalname` , `legalcetype` , `legalno` , `contactname` , `contactphone` , `wateremail` , `appendinfo` , `licenseurl` , `legalnourl` , `officenourl` , `accounturl` , `crediturl` , `officeurl` , `waterurl` , `taxregurl` , `orgcodeurl` , `ispush`, certificateStartDate, certificateExpireDate, companyType, registFinance from t_loan_creditcompany
and creditorderno = #{creditOrderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_loan_creditcompany` ( `creditorderno`, `name`, `startdate`, `regaddress`, `officeaddress`, `orgsize`, `license`, `taxregno`, `orgcode`, `regaccount`, `regdate`, `empsize`, `legalname`, `legalcetype`, `legalno`, `contactname`, `contactphone`, `wateremail`, `appendinfo`, `licenseurl`, `legalnourl`, `officenourl`, `accounturl`, `crediturl`, `officeurl`, `waterurl`, `taxregurl` , `orgcodeurl` , `ispush`, certificatestartdate, certificateexpiredate, companytype, registfinance ) VALUES ( #{creditOrderNo}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{regAddress}, #{officeAddress}, #{orgSize}, #{license}, #{taxRegNo}, #{orgCode}, #{regAccount}, #{regDate}, #{empSize}, #{legalName}, #{legalceType}, #{legalNo}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{waterEmail}, #{appendInfo}, #{licenseUrl}, #{legalNoUrl}, #{officeNoUrl}, #{accountUrl}, #{creditUrl}, #{officeUrl}, #{waterUrl}, #{taxRegUrl}, #{orgCodeUrl}, #{isPush}, #{certificateStartDate}, #{certificateExpireDate}, #{companyType}, #{registFinance} )
